name: Werepenguin's Escape
description:
Special Announcement

Dehoarder 2 is in active development. In order to continue with my development plans, I need your support. Please Wishlist/Follow Dehoarder 2 on Steam today!

Enjoy my back catalog of free games (pay what you want, no third party ads, no in-app purchases). If you have fun with any of them, please consider supporting me on Patreon. ALL Patrons get access to my Daily Standup blog, and Beta Cat level or higher Patron will get automatic access to the earliest alpha playtest releases of Dehoarder 2.

Thank you for your support. 

Slip Into Some Fun

Ludum Dare 35 Compo Entry - #66 in Humor Category

What a way to wake up after a pub crawl! You find yourself in a strange room, and what's this? Moonlight turns you into a penguin?! That makes you a certified Werepenguin.

Find your way out of the mysterious facility that you have found yourself in, by bending moonlight and using your penguin skills to safely traverse teflon-coated ice.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 35. All assets in it, aside from the logo, were created within the 48 hour competition window. This game managed to rank 66th in Humor out of a field of over 1,100 entries. For more details, you can check out my entry on the Ludum Dare site.

Ludum Dare 35 Rankings for this game:

  • Humor 3.57 (66th)
  • Audio 3.14 (264th)
  • Theme 3.66 (276th)
  • Innovation 3.20 (403rd)
  • Graphics 3.08 (437th)
  • Mood 2.94 (469th)
  • Fun 3.06 (506th)
  • Overall 3.14 (533rd)

As this is a legacy project that has not been updated in some time, it is provided without warranty.
